file_name._comment: Please provide path to the file (.csv) where the data is stored (WARNING: data should be contained in the first row and the sheet should be named 'data')

experiment_details._comment0: E_0: the amount of init enzyme in microM, S_0: the (high) amount of init subtrate in microM (e.g., 400), S_1: the (low) amount of init subtrate in microM (e.g., 6.25)
experiment_details._comment1: h: time (in seconds) between two measurements, exp_last: time (in minutes) of the entire experiments (suggested time: no shorter than 15 minutes)

abc_details._comment2: low_K_M and high_K_M: minimal and maximal value of K_M for searching
abc_details._comment3: low_k_cat and high_k_cat: minimal and maximal value of k_cat for searching
abc_details._comment4: N: number of samples in one run, No_sim: number of runs, points_prior: number of points for sampling from prior
